short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the best Amazon price in the EU markets: de, it, es, fr, uk, nl, be, se, pl

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the best Amazon price in Europe with our browser extension. The extension searches not only the one Amazon store, but also amazon.de, amazon.es, amazon.fr, amazon.it, amazon.co.uk to find the best deals for you (like MaxSpar). It converts foreign currencies into euros. This gives you a comprehensive international price comparison and saves you money on technology, tools, appliances, toys and more. 
You don't need to create a new account in every country - just sign in with your existing Amazon account.

Get the best price - get the full Amazon Price Compare
